title: Vanessa Bryant’s Mommy Dearest Sues Her for Millions
description:
Vanessa Bryant’s life changed forever after the tragic helicopter crash that killed her husband, Kobe Bryant, and daughter, Gigi, in 2020, as well as seven others. To make matters worse, less than a year after the crash, Vanessa’s own mother, Sofia Laine, sued her for millions of dollars. Tune in as we break it all down.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
